author: kfogel
msg: * CHANGES: Remove module system from list of new features;

author: kfogel
msg: (svn_client_update): Remove duplicate doc string.  Add code to use
notify_func and notify_baton, along with traversal_info from the
update, to handle externals changes too, just like
svn_client_checkout does.  But keep this code commented out, because
the notification system is not ready for this use.
(svn_cl__update): Obtain notify_func and notify_baton, pass them

author: kfogel
msg: Work on regression tests for external modules (issue #517).
(externals_test_setup): Make more revisions, so we can test "-r".
(checkout): Check out a subdir with externals.
(hook_test): Fix call to svntest.main.run_svn by adding initial
error_expected argument.  Note that this test doesn't even get run
right now, so this change has no immediate effect.

author: kfogel
msg: Handle "-r" in externals properties.  This is part of issue #517.
